appendix.title: Command Line Options
appendix.para: OS Lockdown can be run from the command line, non-interactively, in order to:

listitem.para: Scan a system and generate an Assessment report.
Automatically apply all necessary changes to bring the system into compliance with the specified profile.
Undo any changes made by the last Apply action of the specified profile.

appendix.para: See the oslockdown(8) man page for a complete list of options and examples.
